review.title: Region-Based Approximations for Planning in Stochastic Domains
review.abstract: This paper deals with planning in stochastic areas using partially observable Markov decision processes (POMDPs). POMDPs are difficult to solve. In this paper, a subclass of POMDPs is identified, which are referred to as regionally observable POMDPs, which are easier to solve and can be used to approximate general POMDPs to arbitrary accuracy.
